愞字的基本解释

愞
nuò
古同“懦”。

愞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nuò］
［《廣韻》人朱切，平虞，日。］
［《集韻》奴卧切，去過，泥。］
亦作“愞1”。亦作“懧1”。
(1)畏怯软弱。
(2)懦夫。
(3)柔软。

愞字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　愞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页395第20
【廣韻】而兗切【集韻】乳兗切，?音軟。弱也。或作懦愞?。　又【集韻】乳尹切，音蝡。又【玉篇】【廣韻】【集韻】?奴亂切，音燸。義?同。　又【集韻】奴臥切，音糯。怯也。【前漢·武帝紀】天漢二年，太守以畏愞棄市。

愞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
愞字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
nuò
Gu Tong is "cowardly".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nuò］
[From "Guangyun" Zhu Qi, Pingyu, Day. ]
["Ji Yun" slave lying and cutting, have been, mud. ]
Also known as "愞1". Also known as "懧1".
(1) Fear and weakness.
(2) Cowards.
(3) Soft.
Sorrowful
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　愞; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 395 No. 20
[Guang Yun] and Yan cut [Ji Yun] Milk Yan cut, soft sound. Weak too. Or cowardly?　[Jiyun] Milk Yin cuts, sound creeps. Also [Jade Chapter] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Slave cuts randomly, sound burnt. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Slave lying and cutting, sound waxy. Shy also. [Former Han·Wu Emperor Ji] In the second year of Tian Han, the prefect abandoned the city with fear.
